messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Daily reminder not to sell your soul. Nanotrasen already owns it. If I catch anyone here soulless, I'll kick you in the face with my fist.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a horde of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bridge.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: NANooTRahchEN Ich' GGGAAY LETTTSS ALL GE'TTT...huuuhhh...DDRUNNNK! FFFUUUkKK WooRK

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Do you guys want to end the shift or keep going? It's been pretty safe and sound by my memory

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Testing Lab.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have restored human rights! Time to get back to work

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.
